name: Tiresome
description:
This is my submission to the 2021 SeaJam! This is a fast-paced platformer where you race to get the highest score on the global leaderboard. Each time you play, a random layout is generated! The goal is to remove yourself from the ocean for the betterment of this floating space-rock. Tutorial and controls are in-game. All scripts, art, music, animations, UI, audio, and ideas were made by me.

Click HERE to join my Discord, it's highly encouraged! This is primarily for my indie mobile game, Quadrangle, but you can also talk to me about this game or anything!

Some scripts I got from tutorials and then edited to better fit my needs, and I used LootLocker to create the leaderboard.
